title: A04: Summary of employment, unemployment and economic inactivity for people below state pension age
summary: Labour market summary (employment, unemployment and inactivity) for people below state pension age. Estimates in this table follow the incemental increase in the female state pension age each quarter. These estimates are not the headline labour force survey estimates - they are shown at Tables A02 SA and A02 NSA. This table is updated four times a year in February, May, August and November.
